General.Name: Xiangyu Medical Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Xiangyu Medical Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of rehabilitation and physiotherapy equipment. The company supplies equipment for electrotherapy, magnetic therapy, hot and cold therapy, light therapy, sound therapy, pressure therapy, spa, fumigation, traction, moxibustion series, and massage therapy. It also offers rehabilitation training equipment, such as homework, speech, smart homework, sports training series, and smart sports rehabilitation devices; and medical infrared camera. In addition, the company offers rehabilitation assessment products for balance evaluation, cognitive impairment, language impairment, neurorehabilitation, and psychological evaluation. Xiangyu Medical Co.,Ltd was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Anyang, China.
General.Address: Middle Section of Diku Avenue, Anyang, China, 456300
